DOC.brief_summary: A one year extension study use flexible dos , 20 30 mg daily , open-label bifeprunox .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Outpatients successfully complete Wyeth study 3168A1311US . 2 . A signed date informed consent form study . 3 . No major protocol violation previous study . 1 . Clinically important abnormality note precede shortterm study resolve . 2 . Use prohibit treatment precede shortterm study . 3 . Meeting exclusion criterion precede shortterm study .
